name: Create Shopify products from new rows in Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet
description:
Every time you add a new row to your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet, Make will automatically create a product in Shopify.

Your Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet has to contain headers. The template uses [this worksheet](https://1drv.ms/x/s!AjJKBs6vWrtygQhBzbt2oFFZBJC3?e=bUA6VU).
